skills.skill: Mandarin Chinese and English Language Skills

duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify, develop, and advance new business opportunities through the sales pipeline.
Maintain strong customer relationships at senior and mid-management levels, providing training and support.
Coordinate selling strategies with Product Marketing Group and distribution sales force.
Analyze and report changes in the competitive landscape, market trends, and provide support to distribution channels.
Generate new business opportunities, attend local marketing events, and coordinate with inside sales teams.
Organize and lead internal technical trainings, report on key performance indicators to senior management.
Develop sales and application notes for internal/external communication of products.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering with 5-8 years of directly related experience
